attributes.action: Make HD (High Definition) CCTV a legal requirement for any business that holds a licence to serve alcohol.
attributes.additional_details:
PUT A STOP TO POOR QUALITY CCTV IMAGES!

Everyday we see hundreds of CCTV images being released asking for our help to identify someone in relation to an attack or an altercation.

Most of the time the people within the footage / images are un-identifiable, either due to the poor lighting or simply due to the poor quality of the cameras.

HD (High Definition) CCTV cameras would put a stop to this. This type of CCTV would provide a crystal clear image.

This would put a STOP to people being let off for alcohol driven attacks in nightclubs  and would ensure that there would be no argument in the identification process.
